title: Just stunning! Spacious 2 Bed, 1 bath with lots of light
neighborhood: Renton - 15 minute drive to Kubota Gardens
posting_body: ['-- 2000 Lake Washington Apartments --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$2403 - $3451', 'Apartment:', '2 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '889 sq ft', 'Our location in Renton offers our residents direct access to I-5 and I-405.', 'Along with being close to major highways, you will have access to great shopping and lively entertainment in the hub of South Lake Washington.', "When you live here, you'll be close to work, close to schools, and everything else you need will be close to home.", 'We are right off Lake Washington Blvd N, with quick access to Seattle.', 'Our residents love everything downtown Renton has to offer, and you will too!', 'Pet Policy:', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.2000 Lake Washington Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet pet rent per month.', '$300 deposit and $300 fee for one pet, $400 deposit and $400 fee for two pets.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '❖ 24 Hour Fitness Center', '❖ BBQ/Picnic Area', '❖ Business Center', '❖ Clubhouse', '❖ Lake Access', '❖ Online Services', '❖ Recycling', '❖ Sauna', '❖ Vending Machines', '❖ Waterfront', '❖ 24-hour Emergency Maintenance', '❖ E-lounge with computer & internet access', '❖ Indoor Jacuzzi/Whirlpool', '❖ On-site Management', '❖ Reserved Covered Parking', '❖ Self-Guided Tours', '❖ Shimmering Seasonal Pool/Invigorating Spa & Sauna', '❖ Trash Pickup -
